articles.title: Cochin Airport Commissions Floating Solar Power Plants - NDTV
articles.description: Cochin International Airport Ltd (CIAL), which became the worlds first solar-powered airport in 2015, on Sunday added another feather to its cap, commissioning two floating solar power plants in Kerala.
articles.content:
Cochin International Airport Ltd commissioned two floating solar power plants in Kerala.

articles.title: Mumbai cops invoke Criminal Procedure Code, make CCTVs covering private premises mandatory - Times of India
articles.description: Mumbai police have invoked provisions of section 144 of the Criminal Procedure Code to make it mandatory for all private establishments to instal CCTV
